scene_description: Hero character at edge of cliff overlooking vast fantasy landscape

structured_prompt.short_description: A 40-year-old rugged man with a scar on his cheek, wearing a leather jacket, stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape, contemplating his next move with a sense of melancholy and longing for adventure

objects.description: A 40yo rugged man, scar on cheek, leather jacket
objects.shape_and_color: rugged features, leather jacket, scar on cheek
objects.pose: standing, looking out into the distance
objects.orientation: facing the camera, with a slight turn

structured_prompt.background_setting: A vast fantasy landscape with rolling hills, distant mountains, and a hint of mystical elements, softly focused to keep the main subject in focus

lighting.shadow: Deep shadows, accentuating the scar on the subject's cheek

aesthetics.composition: Medium shot, off-center, with the horizon line at the top third of the frame
aesthetics.negative_prompt: blur, distortion, deformed hands, extra fingers, missing limbs, floating objects, watermark, text, signature, low quality, jpeg artifacts, cartoon, 3d render, plastic skin, ugly, asymmetric eyes, cross-eyed, bad anatomy, mutation

simple_prompt: A 40-year-old rugged man with a scar on his cheek, wearing a leather jacket, stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast fantasy landscape, contemplating his next move with a sense of melancholy and longing for adventure. Lens: 50mm. Lighting: Chiaroscuro
